feed.title: ~/tabi - showcase
feed.subtitle: tabi is an accessible Zola theme with search, multi-language support, optional JavaScript, a perfect Lighthouse score, and comprehensive documentation. Crafted for personal websites and blogs.

entry.title: A Complete Guide to Series
entry.summary: Learn how to organize your posts into sequential series, perfect for tutorials, courses, and multi-part stories.

entry.title: Mastering tabi Settings: A Comprehensive Guide
entry.summary: Discover the many ways you can customise your tabi site.

entry.title: Lost in Translation? Not with tabi's Multilingual Capabilities
entry.summary: Master the art of serving a global audience through tabi's built-in multilingual features. Learn how to change the default language, add multilingual support, and contribute your own translations.

entry.title: Customise tabi with skins and a default theme
entry.summary: Learn how to customise tabi using skins and setting a default theme, making your site uniquely yours.

entry.title: Add comments to your posts with these 4 comment systems
entry.summary: Discover how to enable a comments section on your posts using giscus, utterances, Hyvor Talk, or Isso, enabling reader interaction and feedback.

entry.summary: Learn how to create a custom subset that only includes the necessary glyphs.

entry.title: Secure by default
entry.summary: tabi has an easily customizable Content Security Policy (CSP) with safe defaults. Get peace of mind and an A+ on Mozilla Observatory.
